subject: v1.13.8 RETEST: Events 348 (was 346), still -36 gap
body:
Team,

Retested v1.13.8:

## ALL 5 ENDPOINTS
| Endpoint | Express | AF TEST | Delta | Status |
|----------|---------|---------|-------|--------|
| Categories | 10 | 10 | 0 | PASS |
| Roles | 5 | 5 | 0 | PASS |
| Organizers | 49 | 47 | -2 | FAIL |
| Venues | 64 | 66 | +2 | FAIL |
| Events | 384 | 348 | -36 | IMPROVED (+2) |

## isActive Filter Check
- isActive=true: 348
- isActive=false: 348 (SAME - filter may not be working?)
- Express active=false: 2

Fulton - isActive filter still returning same count for true and false.

Still missing 36 events from Express.

- Sarah
